name: Rally UXR
headline: User Research CRM
description: Rally is a User Research CRM that makes it easy for teams to do research with their users. By automating outreach, scheduling, incentives, and participant management, Rally replaces messy spreadsheets and disjointed tooling, saving teams hours each week.

founders.name: Alec Robins, Founder
founders.description: Alec is the co-founder and CTO of Rally. Before starting Rally, Alec was a Tech Lead at both Facebook and HubSpot. Alec graduated with a degree in Computer Science from Vanderbilt University and currently lives in Nashville.

# The fastest way to talk to your users
Scale Research Operations with Rally’s robust User Research CRM, automated recruitment, and deep integrations to your existing Research tech stack. 
[Book a demo](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</demo>)[Request a 14-day trial](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</request-rally-trial>)
Loved by teams of all sizes
![Github](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/66fded1dc6931aa7f58fd5ea_Github-min.svg)

### The powerhouse of your Research Operations
Rally is a secure and scalable User Research CRM to the core. Build rich participant profiles using data from every research touchpoint. 
![Salesforce](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/640b193aba7044cc344f8026_Salesforce.svg)
![Snowflake](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/640b193a5735a4ff26c70857_Snowflake.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/67223f16912953092e73f4b1_cog%20\(1\).avif)
[Learn more](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</features/participant-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6726617eb98345c0c4594286_CRM.avif)
### **Target your own users or recruit externally**
Manage dynamic populations of your own users safely, build panels of participants through sign-up forms, and target millions of active participants with external panel recruitment. 
[Learn more](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</features/panel-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6729132dddb5d4a6ce16e778_recruitment2.avif)
### **Simplify Research for your team**
Empower your team to conduct any type of research safely. Rally makes email outreach, screeners, scheduling, consent and incentives an intuitive, step-by-step process.
[Learn more](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</features/recruitment>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/672912b542479d508d50945c_Study%20Management2.avif)
### **Set-and-forget governance you can rely on**
Respect and protect your most valuable asset - your customers. Set default and custom cool-down periods, monitor study engagement with contact statuses, and build consent directly into your workflows.
[Learn more](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</features/governance>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/672912b59dd09e9fca747b2d_governance2.avif)
### **Deep integrations to your Research stack**
By harmonizing your preferred research tools and company CRM with your ReOps Platform, you can continue conducting research the way you’re used to, only now, it's more streamlined and actionable.
[Learn more](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</integrations>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6722f2e75fc516fb03880589_Integrations.avif)
### **Global incentives for any research method**
Participants can choose from 2000+ redemption options or **custom incentives** like discount codes. Easily manage and track incentive spend for different teams or business units.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/67224a6d567458a1526bc508_tremendous%20copy.avif)
[Learn more](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</features/incentives>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/672669571d2fa696f24df20c_incentives.avif)
### Communicate research impact with Activity Reports
Capture all research activity happening in your organization, understand trends over time, and optimize research resources. For the first time ever.
[Learn more](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</features/dashboards>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/67266b88a74f2475a75c2a78_dashboards.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6761939b5065c7fc7937031d_g2%20badges.png)

Rally
is mission control for Research Operations
Rally is the most powerful Research Operations Platform on the market. With a robust User Research CRM at our core, Rally safely automates research recruitment while deeply connecting to the tools you already use to do research.
[Why Rally?](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</why-rally>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6723ef79efa5e2155ce18ac1_RALLY%20ECOSYSTEM.avif)
## Leading companies use Rally to level up Research Operations
![Webflow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/66fded1d312d7ea951044dc6_Webflow-min.svg)![Braze](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/66fdee9f27d47487146a83f8_Braze-min.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/65d4fcc01f94f626be4558bf_ezcater.svg)![Faire](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/66fded1d7bcf2cef89e7b4c0_Faire-min.svg)
## From bottlenecks to breakthroughs — how Webflow democratizes research with Rally
“The logistics for conducting research can be a blackhole of time and resources. Rally does a great job reducing a lot of that overhead and providing an end-to-end solution for all the different phases of a research project.”
Laith Ulaby
| 
Former Director of Insights at Webflow
[Read case study](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</case-study/webflow>)

Ki Choi
|

### Security that scales
Securing your customer’s data is core to Rally’s DNA and has been a priority since day 1.
  * Enterprise-level certifications and compliance
  * Robust application security
  * Data networking & company-wide security


[Learn more about security](https://www.rallyuxr.com/</security>)

### The powerhouse of your Research Operations
Rally is a secure and scalable User Research CRM to the core. Build rich participant profiles using data from every research touchpoint. 
![Salesforce⟨36⟩]
![Snowflake⟨37⟩]
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/67223f16912953092e73f4b1_cog%20\(1\).avif)
Learn more⟨2⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6726617eb98345c0c4594286_CRM.avif)
### **Target your own users or recruit externally**
Manage dynamic populations of your own users safely, build panels of participants through sign-up forms, and target millions of active participants with external panel recruitment. 
Learn more⟨7⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6729132dddb5d4a6ce16e778_recruitment2.avif)
### **Simplify Research for your team**
Empower your team to conduct any type of research safely. Rally makes email outreach, screeners, scheduling, consent and incentives an intuitive, step-by-step process.
Learn more⟨5⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/672912b542479d508d50945c_Study%20Management2.avif)
### **Set-and-forget governance you can rely on**
Respect and protect your most valuable asset - your customers. Set default and custom cool-down periods, monitor study engagement with contact statuses, and build consent directly into your workflows.
Learn more⟨8⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/672912b59dd09e9fca747b2d_governance2.avif)
### **Deep integrations to your Research stack**
By harmonizing your preferred research tools and company CRM with your ReOps Platform, you can continue conducting research the way you’re used to, only now, it's more streamlined and actionable.
Learn more⟨11⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6722f2e75fc516fb03880589_Integrations.avif)
### **Global incentives for any research method**
Participants can choose from 2000+ redemption options or **custom incentives** like discount codes. Easily manage and track incentive spend for different teams or business units.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/67224a6d567458a1526bc508_tremendous%20copy.avif)
Learn more⟨6⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/672669571d2fa696f24df20c_incentives.avif)
### Communicate research impact with Activity Reports
Capture all research activity happening in your organization, understand trends over time, and optimize research resources. For the first time ever.
Learn more⟨9⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/67266b88a74f2475a75c2a78_dashboards.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ffd577a0f3454c97c26b78/6761939b5065c7fc7937031d_g2%20badges.png)

generated_description:
### Rally UXR: Streamlining User Research Operations

**Company Overview**
Founded in 2021 and based in New York, Rally UXR was born out of the need to simplify user research processes. As a part of Y Combinator Batch W22, it has quickly established itself as a go-to User Research Customer Relationship Management (CRM) solution. With a nimble team of 13, Rally is transforming how organizations conduct user research by replacing cumbersome workflows with a more efficient, automated platform.

**Mission**
Rally UXR’s mission revolves around creating the premier User Research CRM. By automating tasks like outreach, scheduling, incentives, and participant management, they liberate teams from the shackles of disjointed tools and chaotic spreadsheets. The outcome? Teams can focus on what truly matters—gathering insights from their users—while Rally takes care of the logistics.

**Key Features**
Rally's platform is robust, boasting a comprehensive suite of features tailored for research operations, including:
- **Participant Management**: Build rich profiles and manage data from every research touchpoint.
- **External Recruitment**: Access a vast panel of participants (over 3 million) for diverse research needs.
- **Scheduling**: Simplify the setup of interviews—one-on-one, group, or round robin.
- **Study Management**: Cover all aspects of research, from interviews to focus groups.
- **Incentives**: Automate global incentives for participants, ensuring smooth tracking and redemption.
- **Governance**: Enforce data protection and informed consent protocols to safeguard users’ information.
- **Integration**: Harmonize pre-existing tools with ease for an accelerated research process.

**Community and Support**
Rally UXR has fostered a supportive environment for its users, consistently receiving high praise for its customer service and valuable insights from industry experts. Notably, the platform has been rated 4.8 out of 5 stars on G2, which speaks volumes about its impact and effectiveness.

**The Market Need**
As organizations increasingly recognize the importance of user-centered design, the demand for efficient, streamlined research processes has soared. Rally UXR steps up to meet this challenge, allowing research teams to democratize their efforts while providing the tools necessary to run studies at scale.

**Feedback from Users**
Users across various industries sing praises of Rally UXR:
- **User Research Managers**: “Rally transformed our recruitment approach, making it more coherent and efficient.”
- **Research Operations Specialists**: “It’s a game-changer. We consolidated multiple tools into one seamless platform.”
- **UX Researchers**: “The ease of use, combined with powerful capabilities, makes Rally my favorite tool.”

### Conclusion
Rally UXR isn't just another SaaS tool; it's a mission control for research operations that empowers teams to conduct effective user research without the usual complexities. Whether you’re just starting in research or you’re a seasoned pro, Rally provides a comprehensive solution at your fingertips. If you want to streamline your user research, visit [Rally UXR](https://www.rallyuxr.com/) to learn more and explore a free trial.
